Class FilteringOperations

extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Ricards Cacurs Class consisting of operations for filtering image in DenseMatrix64F format

    • Method Detail

      • convolve2D

        public static org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F convolve2D(org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F inputImage,
                                                      org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F kernel)
        Functions performs 2D convolution on image given in DenseMatrix64F format
        Parameters:
        inputImage - image on which to perform convolution
        kernel - filter kernel. Filter is considered to be centered in floor((kernelHeight-1)/2) floor((kernelWidth-1)/2)
        Returns:
        DenseMatrix64F type image same size as input image

      • convolve1D

        public static org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F convolve1D(org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F input,
                                                      org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F filter)
        Function performing 1D convolution of two signals. Resulting convolution is same size as input.
        Parameters:
        input - signal packed in DenseMatrix64F type (doesn't matter if column or row)
        filter - packed in DenseMatrix64F type (doesn't matter if column or row)
        Returns:
        DenseMatrix64F convolution result. Format corresponds to format of the input.

      • gaussianBlur

        public static org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F gaussianBlur(org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F input,
                                                        double sigmaSQ,
                                                        int kernelSize)
        Function that performs Gaussian blur on image given in type DenseMatrix64F
        Parameters:
        input - image on which to perform gaussian blur
        sigmaSQ - standard deviation for gaussian filter (sigma^2)
        kernelSize - kernel size
        Returns:
        returns Filtered image the same size as input image
